# Spells (Alphabetical List - Y)
## Ya-Ye
**[[Yakamo's Anger (Spell)|Yakamoâ€™s Anger]]:** Blinds creatures within 10 ft.

**[[Yari of Air (Spell)|Yari of Air]]:** Melee attack deals 1d8+1/two levels damage.

## Yk-Yo
**[[Yochlol Blessing (Spell)|Yochlol Blessing]]:** Target gains eight tentacle attacks, resistance to acid and electricity, AC bonus.

**[[Yoke of Mercy (Spell)|Yoke of Mercy]]:** Target deals nonlethal damage.

**Youthful Appearance:** Target appears younger.
